title: Change admin dashboard URL path to a custom less-obvious route

requirements.text: Change the admin dashboard route in the frontend router from '/admin' to '/pindpahadi-manage-2024'. Update all internal links, redirects, and references that point to '/admin' (including any navigation guards or route definitions in App.tsx) to use the new path '/pindpahadi-manage-2024'. The old '/admin' path should no longer resolve to the dashboard.

quotes: i want to change the name of url
Make it harder to find by using a less obvious URL path (like `/pindpahadi-admin-2024`)

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to '/pindpahadi-manage-2024' loads the password-protected admin dashboard
Navigating to '/admin' no longer loads the admin dashboard (404 or redirects to home)
All internal links or programmatic navigations that previously pointed to '/admin' now point to '/pindpahadi-manage-2024'
The new path does not appear in the main navigation header or mobile sticky bar

constraints: Do not expose the new admin URL path in any visible navigation element (header, footer, mobile sticky bar)
Do not change any backend logic or booking data structures
nonGoals: Adding authentication beyond the existing hardcoded password
Modifying the admin dashboard UI or functionality
